content: Not bad but way too easy. Did 3 easy levels and skipped to very hard. Did about 10 of those and refunded. Waaaay too easy

I did have fun and I really like the aesthetics of the game, but it is just way too easy. I completed the whole game in less than 2 hours :(. EDIT: as stated below, they have made new levels, but they are also way too easy (I don't play chess btw). I completed level 100 in about 5 seconds with 3 moves where you have 5 moves to make. Lvl 98 was pretty challenging though.
replyContent: Hello! Check out the recent update for more difficult levels! Thanks for your review

content: The game is really fun my only problem is in the game I can't turn off vibrations if that could be implemented I would easily give this five stars. Also maybe later in the future make it so we can choose the theme of the board instead of it changing every few levels because not gonna lie there are some themes which I really don't like

Fun and functional, if not terribly challenging. I must, however, remove a star for the fact that every move generates a full throttle haptic feedback buzz and there's no option to turn it off. A supremely annoying oversight for an otherwise well realized game to be burdened with.
The puzzles are fun and looks are ok. What is really annoying is that although sound can be turned off, the haptic feedback cannot.

Good game, but there are a few small things that need fixing. First, speed up the menus. It takes far too long to get into the game for me to want to even open the app. Second, the next level button at the end of each level should really take you to the next level and not to level select. Maybe add a second option for level select? Lastly, add a setting to turn of the vibrate functionality. Also, label menu buttons maybe? Cool idea though!

Fun time killer, though a couple things stop it being 5 stars. First is that I personally don't like the sound the pieces make, but I like the background music. There isn't a way to only turn off one or the other though. Secondly, the time between levels is a bit too long. The animation for the tick and the arrow is drawn out and takes you to a menu rather than the next level. Speeding up the animation and putting you into the next level would improve this in my opinion. Otherwise it's great!
